title: MY SNOWDOWN SHOP!!!
body: RIOT, WHY CANT YOU CHECK EVERYTHING BEFORE THE DEADLINE? I HAVE BEEN WAITING FOR MORE THAN 12 HOURS JUST FOR MY SNOWDOWN SHOP. YOU HURT THE PLAYERS LOVE LOL. IT'S STILL NO UP AFTER I WOKE UP. THIS SERVICE IS TOO BAD. I WANT MY SNOWDOWN SHOP! OR AT LEAST GIVE US AN EXPECTED TIME! DO NOT DEFAULT!!!!!!

replies.body: i got semi-decent skins, Battle Boss blitz, high Noon Yas, and Muay Thai Lee Sin, YUSSS!

Oh please you probably dont even wanna see your snowdown shop, I just looked at mine ready to splash some cash and 4 of them are 520rp skins that got discounted... 

The only good discount i got was the 1350 El tigre braum skin which was reduced by 70% but i have maybe played him once my entire gaming history lol
yeh, me too. all the deals i dont want.
I got challenger Ahri in mine but it wont let me buy her :'(
